Articles.Content:
can you please fix the problem where when ksp2 is loading it gets stuck on "pumping sim once" then it just freezes it happens every time i run the game it is a major bug it just renders the game useless. 

system info

  • CPU Intel® Core® I7 12700KF
  • Operating System Windows® 11 Pro Build 22000 Rev 194
       
       
  • Ram 16 Gigabytes
  •  256 Gigabytes of storage M.2 SSD Pci Express 2.0
  • Intel® Iris® Pro Graphics 6200 
Edited March 11, 2023 by what the heck bro
needed to add system info
Split from another thread and moved to bug reports.

On 3/11/2023 at 12:41 PM, what the heck bro said:

Intel® Iris® Pro Graphics 6200 

I think I see your problem right here. While the Intel Ark based video cards are new, KSP 2 has not YET been written to work with those cards. It may be a little too soon to expect KSP 2 to work on the Iris Pro Graphics 6200. As of right now, Steam only lists AMD and NVidia based cards. It may take a while before the Intel Ark based cards will be supported. 

If you have an AMD or NVidia card that meets at least the minimum requirements, you could temporarily install that card to play. Other option would be to wait and check the KSP 2 web page for updates. It is still early in development.
